casebody.data:
James J. KANE et al., Plaintiffs in Error, v. John BORGIO, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 17, 1926.) No. 345. Myle J. Holley and S. J. Oxenberg, both of New York City, for plaintiffs in error. Cohen, Cole & Weiss, of New York City (Harry J. Leffert, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment (8. F.[2d] 362) affirmed, with costs.
